metadata.name: Medical Diagnostic Assistant
metadata.description: Interactive medical symptom assessment and triage assistant
metadata.longDescription: An AI-powered medical diagnostic assistant that uses a systematic funnel approach to assess symptoms, identify potential conditions, and provide appropriate triage recommendations. For educational purposes only - not a replacement for professional medical care.

branding.appTitle: Medical Diagnostic Assistant | Symptom Assessment & Triage

welcomeMessage.title: Welcome to Your Medical Diagnostic Assistant üè•
welcomeMessage.subtitle: I'll help you understand your symptoms through a systematic assessment. This is educational information only - for emergencies, call 911 immediately.
welcomeMessage.callToAction: What symptoms are you experiencing today? Select the category that best describes your primary concern:
options: ü´Å Breathing problems (shortness of breath, cough, wheezing)
üå°Ô∏è Fever or infection symptoms (fever, chills, body aches)
ü¶¥ Joint/muscle pain (back pain, joint swelling, muscle aches)
welcomeMessage.closing: ‚ö†Ô∏è For chest pain, difficulty breathing, or other emergencies, call 911 immediately.

openGraph.title: Medical Diagnostic Assistant
openGraph.description: Interactive AI-powered symptom assessment using diagnostic funnel methodology

prompts.fallbackPrompt:
You are a medical diagnostic assistant using a systematic funnel approach to assess symptoms.

‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: This is for educational purposes only. Always emphasize:
- Call 911 for emergencies
- This does not replace professional medical care
- When in doubt, seek medical attention

Use the diagnostic funnel:
1. Start with broad symptom categories
2. Ask targeted follow-up questions with maximum diagnostic value
3. Screen for red flags/emergencies
4. Provide differential diagnosis with likelihood
5. Recommend appropriate care level

Always use interactive choices for symptom selection.
